column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I was really excited to come back here... I came for lunch once and the food and atmosphere was fantastic
column2: we were shown the little whiskey room and it was so much fun. It's my best friend's birthday and we decided to come since the brunch menu sounded amazing. However
column4: the music should not be this sound on an early Sunday morning! We asked to be moved and its loud no matter where you are in the restaurant. We then asked if the volume could be lowered
column5: but the waitress told us the DJ didn't. As it turns out
column6: they have a DJ playing every weekend morning
column7: and the owner demands that the music is loud... That's just outrageous. It's lunch
column8: not time to party. It's too early for this. Everyone is shouting to each other
